title: KINGSLAND New North Road Character One Bedroom with lock up garage
description: **Scroll to the bottom of the page, click “email the agent” or “view their website link” and follow prompts to register – PLEASE DO NOT PH/TXT*** Just step out your door and you are in the heart of Kingsland. Check out our walk through tour: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HQl1r9frN-Q Spacious unfurnished one bedroom character unit is in the heart of this popular suburb. Bus at door, trains 5 minutes, Eden Park is only a short walk away. Spacious lounge area, hallway is big enough for office or dining table. Property has fibre connection. Kitchen also a good size with room for a dining table Laundry is in the bathroom area. Bathroom has shower only. DVS system fitted, plus fixed heater in the lounge area. No pets allowed and no smoking. Suit maximum of two occupants. Move in costs: four weeks bond, plus the first weeks rent in advance.
